root.name: Ys V: Ushinawareta Suna no Miyako Kefin
root.description: OverviewYs V: Ushinawareta Suna no Miyako Kefin (Ys V: Kefin, The Lost City of Sand) is the fifth entry in the Ys action RPG series by Falcom. The game was released for the Super Famicom in 1995 and an "Expert" version of the game, which featured a higher difficulty level, was released in 1996 by Koei. A remake of Ys V was created by Taito and Arc System Works in 2006 for the PlayStation 2 under the title Ys V: Lost Kefin, Kingdom of Sand.An unofficial English translation patch for the original Super Famicom version of Ys V is currently being worked on by Aeon Genesis.
